name: diagnose
posTip: A word that describes an action, condition or experience.

trans_examp.trans_en: to recognize and name the exact character of a disease or a problem, by examining it

example.egtrans: 那位专家作出的诊断是癌症。

example.eg: His condition was diagnosed as some type of blood disorder.
example.egtrans: 他的病被诊断为某种血液病。

example.eg: She was diagnosed with/as having diabetes.
The electrician has diagnosed a fault in the wiring.
example.egtrans: 电工查出了一处线路故障。
